overview: Ferdinand doesn't have it easy: first he falls in love with his boss's daughter of all people among 100 hot girls, then he finds out that the company is dealing weapons. When the police suspect him and are on his ass from then on, he makes a foolhardy decision.  Armed with a red Ferrari and a MIG jet fighter, he goes to war in Siberia against the Russian mafia and its diabolical leader.  His mission: to save the company and his life, and incidentally win the heart of his beloved. A murderous battle to the death begins...
title: Bad Boys - Bad Toys
